label.en: If you are included in the program, which phone number do you want to receive your BoB Finance information on? (With country-code. It should look like: +961 00 000 000)
If you are included in the program, what is the first name on the ID that will be used to pick up the payment at BoB Finance?
If you are included in the program, what is the last name on the ID that will be used to pick up the payment at BoB Finance?
